amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used in contravention of Federal law which prohibits localities from enacting laws that prevent police officers from reporting immigration information to the Federal government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used in contravention of section 1373 of title 8, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
